Package services

Class AppointmentService

java.lang.Object
services.Service
services.AppointmentService
public class AppointmentService extends Service
AppointmentService is responsible for interacting with the appointments table in the database.

    • getUpcomingAppointment

      public Appointment getUpcomingAppointment()
      Gets an upcoming appointment. An appointment is "upcoming" if it is within 15 minutes of when this method is invoked.
      Returns:
      an Appointment, or null if one does not exist.

    • hasConflicts

      public boolean hasConflicts(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime entTime, int id)
      Checks if there is already an appointment schedules during the start invalid input: '&' end time supplied. This is used to prevent overlapping appointments.
      Parameters:
      startTime - the time the appointment starts
      entTime - the time the appointment ends
      id - the id of the appointment
      Returns:
      true if there's a conflict, false otherwise

    • getAppointmentTypesByMonth

      public List<AppointmentTypeItem> getAppointmentTypesByMonth()

      Returns:
      a List of appointment type items
